subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeff Burton brushed aside a poor finish a week ago and re-established the No. 31 Chevrolet as the racecar to beat in the Chase for the Nextel Cup points championship.
snippet: Jeff Burton brushed aside a poor finish a week ago and re-established the No. 31 Chevrolet as the racecar to beat in the Chase for the Nextel Cup points championship.
